content.p: Kash Pictures Internship Description: Establish in 2009, Kash Pictures currently focuses on providing top notch, latest and new age entertainment services in Film and TV production. We assist film-makers both in creative and technical domains, which include foreign production support, production services and line production services to editing suites. Be it outdoor or indoor, minor or major, Kash Pictures will ensure the highest standard of quality products to any organisations that places its trust in us. From conceptualisation, to planning, to execution and producing any entertainment products, we ensure you that Kash Pictures will provide nothing but the Best. How to apply: Students is encouraged to submit their application form and CV via their respective school and you can download the internship application form here. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
